text:
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend have always been cute together, but they really took our love into overdrive when they started a family. In April 2016, the pair welcomed their beautiful daughter, Luna, and two years later, they became parents to their adorable son, Miles.

In September 2020, Teigen revealed she experienced a pregnancy loss of their third child, a son named Jack, which she opened up about in an emotional Medium essay. "Jack will always be loved, explained to our kids as existing in the wind and trees and the butterflies they see," she wrote about Jack in the essay's conclusion. Two years later, on Aug. 3, 2022, Teigen announced the joyful news that she is pregnant with the couple's fourth child.

"The last few years have been a blur of emotions to say the least, but joy has filled our home and hearts again," Teigen wrote in her Instagram announcing the pregnancy. She continued, "Every appointment I've said to myself, 'ok if it's healthy today I'll announce' but then I breathe a sigh of relief to hear a heartbeat and decide I'm just too nervous. I don't think I'll ever walk out of an appointment with more excitement than nerves but so far, everything is perfect and beautiful and I'm feeling hopeful and amazing."

Between their endless family vacations and their precious moments on Instagram (like Miles crashing a zoom session to dance on his dad's shoulders!), it's easy to see just how devoted Teigen and Legend are to their children. Prepare to melt over their sweetest family moments ahead.
title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend May Be Cute, but Luna and Miles Take the Cake
